document.full_text: germany's der spiegel magazine published photos on monday of american soldiers posed over the bloodied corpse of an afghan civilian whose slaying is being prosecuted by the u.s. military as premeditated murder.
document.title: photos of u.s. soldiers and afghan corpse published
lines_and_colors: germany's der spiegel magazine published photos on monday of american soldiers posed over the bloodied corpse of an afghan civilian whose slaying is being prosecuted by the u.s. military as premeditated murder.
